description:
A priest turns into a carp while he is very sick.  A singing pot tells of treasure.  A giant teapot monster haunts an abandoned temple.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Koi ni Natta Osho-san / Okama no Uta / Cha Tsubo
The Priest Becomes a Carp / The Pot`s Song / Teapot
鯉になった和尚さん / お釜の歌 / 茶つぼ
